Title: Out of the Blue
Plot: On Rachel?s order, Peter and Jared must court a client whose business was struck by a priceless meteorite. Once the government tries to seize the artifact, the boys? legal maneuvering steers their client toward his Indian ancestry in an effort to save it. Infeld defends Damien for the murder of a judge, subsequently revealing a few secrets of his own about that fateful day.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
